title: Between the Scenes - The Trump Effect: George Washington Reconsidered
itunes:title: Between the Scenes - The Trump Effect: George Washington Reconsidered
description:
Just like with Brett Kavanaugh and now George Washington, Trevor knows that any time President Trump vouches for someone, their reputation suffers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
